text: Zhenzhu que yi yong leyuan huanqu xinshimen de shengming he caichan. Tamen wei zhenzhu er zhandou; tamen huo sha di zhi guo, huo shashenchengren. Na shi zhenshi de yingxu, jilu zai “tao la te”,“yin zhi lei” he “gulanjing” zhong. Shui bi zhenzhu geng neng jianyue ne? Nimen yao wei ziji suo dijie de qiyue er gaoxing. Na zheng shi weida de chenggong.
